column1: Narrator : The island is small, flat and green
Narrator : On the beach, a pannel reads : « Metal and leather shop, follow the road »

column2: Choice : Show me what you got (trade)
column3: Choice : Have you heard about NOMTRESOR ?
OtherSpeak : The only people who are interested by this are from DIRECTIONTOFORMULA
column4: OtherSpeak : Nope, never heard about it

column8: OtherSpeak : Pirates come here to dress for the winter
column12: PlayerSpeak : He’s lying on the floor, dead
